licenseCategoryPrefix.description: The letter code of the category of the category of machines the applicant is applying for a teaching license for.

teachingLicenseMachineWorkedOnDtos.description: The registration number of the Work machine the applicant has worked on.

nationalId.description: The national id of the applicant.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the applicant.

email.description: The email address of the applicant.

postalCode.description: The postal code of the applicant.

companyNationalId.description: The national id of the company.

contactNationalId.description: The national id of the company contact.

contactName.description: The name of the company contact.

contactPhoneNumber.description: The phone number of the company contact.

contactEmail.description: The email of the company contact.

machineRegistrationNumbers.description: A list of machines the applicant has worked on

machineType.description: The type of the work machine the applicant has worked on.

dateWorkedOnMachineFrom.description: The date the applicant started working on the machine.

dateWorkedOnMachineTo.description: The date the applicant has worked on the machine to.

hoursWorkedOnMachine.description: The number of hours the applicant has worked on the machine.
